definitions: the action of enclosing something in or as if in a capsule

examples.text: encapsulation of contaminants within a solid glasslike matrix
encapsulation of the iron prevents its interaction with food

shortDefinitions: action of enclosing something in or as if in capsule

definitions: the process of enclosing a message or signal in a set of codes which allow transfer across networks

examples.text: proper encapsulation of data for network transmission

shortDefinitions: process of enclosing message or signal in set of codes which allow transfer across networks

definitions: the provision of an interface for a piece of software or hardware to allow or simplify access for the user.
shortDefinitions: provision of interface for piece of software or hardware

definitions: the succinct expression or depiction of the essential features of something

examples.text: this article is an encapsulation of everything that is wrong with the economy

shortDefinitions: succinct expression or depiction of essential features of something
